column1: Little Goat Diner////So two sandwiches (ala carte) and a shared appetizer of friend pickles
column2: water and the bill split two ways was about $21 per person. I was fully aware going in that this is what it would be
column3: but I hate to be that guy to say it might have been slightly overhyped and a little overpriced. Glad I went. I would go again
column4: but it wouldn't be based on my suggestion.
